Black Wall Street in Tulsa, Oklahoma was one of the most prosperous Black communities in America. Tonight, Trump said he deliberately slowed testing as 120,000 people died. Months into this pandemic, there is still no plan for this public health and economic crisis. 

To start, we need more tests, more PPE, and real economic relief. And we must vote Trump out in November. https://twitter.com/cnnbrk/status/1274515022836891649 QT @cnnbrk President Trump, at his Oklahoma rally, says he asked to "slow the testing down" because an increase in testing leads to an increase in coronavirus cases https://trib.al/QthwCWJ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ea_8qKJWoAE1X1M.jpg

120,000 Americans are dead from the worst pandemic in a century, & the President said tonight that he slowed down testing so the public death toll wouldn't be worse.

We still don't have a national testing strategy & Trump's plan is to bury his head. This is a deadly failure.
